The stacktrace shows that Byte.parseByte is used instead of Files.readAllBytes, can you double-check?

assertThat(Files.readAllBytes(build)).contains("implementation 'io.quarkus:quarkus-hibernate-orm'");
if I type just this, i.e. without the Byte.parseByte it gives an error saying to use Byte.parseByte
You need to convert the byte[] to String to use the contains() method. See #10678 (comment) to see how it would look like
